paragraph.paragraph:
The flat view
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/16x16/view_flat_icon.png displays all the features for the current class, i.e. including both written-in and inherited features; it is available either through the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/20_editor/index.xml editor or through the Class tab of the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/05_general_interface_description/20_eiffelstudio_window_overview.xml context tool . This is also the only view where
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/40_debugger/20_breakpoints/index.xml breakpoints are displayed.
paragraph.warning:
Caution: For classes with many
./30_ancestors_format.xml ancestors , computation of the flat view may require a few seconds.
paragraph.note: Note: This view is not available to .NET classes which are imported through by means of an assembly. This is because the assembly .exe or .dll exposes only the interface methods and therefore is no implementation to display. Such classes may be viewed, in a clickable format using the Contract View or Interface View.
